instructions: Place the fork on the left side of the table cloth with the tines facing up
Place the dinner knife on the right side of the table cloth
place the salad fork to the left of the dinner fork with the tines pointing up
place the salad knife to the right of the dinner knife with the blade facing the forks
place the soup spoon to the right of the salad knife with the bowl facing upward
place the dessert spoon at the top of the table cloth with the bowl pointing left
place the dessert spoon next to the soup spoon with the bowl pointing up
Place the dessert spoon at the top center of the table cloth with the bowl pointing left
place the dinner plate in the center of the table cloth under the dessert spoon
place the bread plate to the left of the dessert spoon
place the butter knife diagonally on the bread plate
place the wine glass above the soup spoon
place the water glass next to the dessert spoon on the right side of the table cloth.
place the napkin in the middle of the dinner plate
